archimate:Assessment.name: Aki wants to see consequential accountability for devations
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
Rationale: Aki want audit deviations to be reported on a monthly basis with the names of the responsible individuals.
This implies that he really wants to see action. He's advocating for a rigorous approach to accountability where accountability is taken seriously, and each individual understands that their actions (or inactions) have direct impacts. This approach aims to instill a sense of responsibility and urgency in addressing audit deviations.
